channel.title: CVE Feed for HYPR -- HYPR Windows WFA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HYPR -- HYPR Windows WFA

item.title: CVE-2022-1984|2024-08-03T00:24:44.075Z -- hypr -- hypr%20windows%20wfa
item.description: This issue affects: HYPR Windows WFA versions prior to 7.2; Unsafe Deserialization vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access (WFA) before version 7.2 may allow local authenticated attackers to elevate privileges via a malicious serialized payload.
